Description / Pseudocode: Generates FFmpeg 'minterpolate' filter string for optical flow slow motion.
Tech Limits / Notes: Uses MCI (Motion Compensated Interpolation). Fast motion can cause 'warping' artifacts. 'Jerky' results occur if motion estimation fails (fallback to dup frames) or on extreme slowdowns (>400%) without high source framerate.
Hardening Steps: Add proper service wrapper; Validate target FPS range; Add GPU acceleration support (CUDA/TensorRT) for optical flow.

Description / Pseudocode: Main render engine. Orchestrates Timeline -> FFmpeg Command -> Output Video.
Tech Limits / Notes: Scopes: render:720p, render:1080p. CPU bound unless hardware encoding configured.

Description / Pseudocode: Face blurring service. Workflow: List Sequences -> Analyze Regions (Face) -> Add 'face_blur' filter to Timeline.
Tech Limits / Notes: Default filter strength 1.0. Relies on video_regions accuracy. If regions misses a face, it won't be blurred.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Add confidence threshold tuning; Add 'blur_type' options (pixelate vs gaussian).

Description / Pseudocode: Renders text strings into transparent images for overlays. Input: Text, Font, Size -> Output: Image Asset.
Tech Limits / Notes: Preview text in meta truncated to 20 chars. CPU rendering via PIL/TypographyRenderer.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Add caching for identical text requests; Support vector output (SVG).

Description / Pseudocode: Smart Crop / Reframing. Uses Audio (Speech events) and Visual Meta (Subjects) to generate Pan/Scan keyframes.
Tech Limits / Notes: Fallback: Center (0.5, 0.5) if no speech/subjects found. 'Jerky' if keyframes are too sparse or interpolation is linear.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Add smoothing (Spline interpolation) to keyframes to prevent mechanical camera movement.

Description / Pseudocode: Detects regions of interest (Faces, etc.). Wrapper for backends: CPU Face (dlib/cv2), OpenCV, Stub.
Tech Limits / Notes: Performance depends on backend. CPU backend is slow for 4K video.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Add GPU/TensorRT backend; Cache results aggressively.

Description / Pseudocode: Analyzes video for structure: Shot Boundaries, Subject Centers, Timestamps. Used by Focus Automation.
Tech Limits / Notes: Sample interval driven (default often 500ms). Misses fast cuts if interval > shot length.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Move to frame-accurate detection (scene detect filter).

Description / Pseudocode: Generates FFmpeg expression strings for 360-degree video projection (equirectangular to rectilinear).
Tech Limits / Notes: Uses 'lerp' for V1 interpolation. Complex math in FFmpeg filter string can be slow.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Add Quaternion slerp for smoother rotation.

Description / Pseudocode: 2-Pass Stabilization. Pass 1: vidstabdetect -> .trf file. Pass 2: vidstabtransform.
Tech Limits / Notes: Requires 2 full passes over footage. High CPU usage.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Cache .trf files to avoid re-running Pass 1 on same clip.

Description / Pseudocode: Transcribes audio to caption segments (SRT/JSON style).
Tech Limits / Notes: Accuracy depends on underlying STT model (not specified in partial scan).

Description / Pseudocode: Applies predefined editing patterns (slots) to a set of assets.
Syncs multiple angles via audio waveform matching. Returns offset (ms) and confidence.
Tech Limits / Notes: Requires clear audio on all tracks. Fails if audio is silent or radically different.
Hardening Steps: Missing spec.yaml; Add visual matching (feature matching) fallback.

Description / Pseudocode: Viewer for CAD data. Features: cad:gantt (Gantt Chart View), cad:overlay (Overlays).
Tech Limits / Notes: Depends on cost_model_id and artifact existence. Returns 404 if artifacts missing.

Description / Pseudocode: Comprehensive Image Engine. Features: Presets (Social/Web), Composition (Layers, Blend Modes), Subject Detection (OpenCV), Auto Crop (Smart/Center), Generative Fill Hooks.
